data.message: My problem is not to block somebody but to delete someone who illegally have Facebook Account under my professional name as a writer TEO ANTONI0.This is a bogus account and it is a case of identity theft.The biodata of me was taken from wikepedia and pictures of some of my best friends .It post also that I am a public figure.The other account which I have suspicion is the same person who made a Facebook Account," MGA TULA  NI TEO ANTONIO" who post  some pictures of persons who said they like my poems including my picture who said I like my personal poem.The facebook account did not ask  permission from me. The Facebook Account although not publish yet my poetry but some pictures of my friends.This is a grave abuse against intellectual property rights.I hope  the Facebook Officers will act to delele immediately this bogus facebook account under my pen name TEO ANTONIO and MGA TULA NI TEO ANTONIO and help me to know the person behind so that some of my friends  coulld file case in our court of justice. i hope and pray that this message will be given immediate action from FACEBOOK. Thank you and God bless my case.
